Action.author: weeds
Action.body: This says work is in progress- can we get a status update on this? Chris? Dave?

Action.author: weeds
Action.body: Reached out to Dave and he shared the following: We've engaged with an auditor and the estimate is four weeks. I'll ask the auditor to prioritize the fabric audit

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: I shared with Dave that IBM has a crypto-export compliance review process that we have completed to "ship" our offerings. We cannot share the actual audit, but the fact that it has been completed successfully we can share.

Action.author: dhuseby
Action.body: This is underway with an outside auditor hired by HL.

Action.author: dhuseby
Action.body: We just received the final report from the auditor that Hyperledger retained. I will be going through it tomorrow and filing any JIRA bugs that come out of it.

Action.author: dhuseby
Action.body: I completed all of the steps for legal compliance last week. This covers Fabric, Sawtooth, and Iroha.
